EmailTemplate.description: An email is sent to the program notifying that their amendment has been submitted successfully
EmailTemplate.name: ODE COL Request Submitted
EmailTemplate.subject: Change of Location Submitted for {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Name__c},{!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_OOS_Program_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
A Change of Location amendment request was successfully submitted on{!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Submission_Date__c} for {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Name__c}, {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_OOS_Program_Number__c}. The requested change will not take effect until it has been approved. A representative will contact the program to schedule the Change of Location Inspection.
Log on to OCLQS to view the details of this request. The Licensing Online Team This e-mail message, including any attachments, is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s) and may contain private, confidential, and/or privileged information. Any unauthorized review, use, disclosure, or distribution is prohibited.
